Ordinary - Permanent Friday Night




4:29 minutes (6.15 MB)

Straight-up lounge stuff. Horns and ev-er-y-thang.

Bart Ryan - electric guitar

Adam Marcello - drums

Matt Delvecchio - bass

Sally Jaye - vocals
